text.section: The Governor may designate a citizen of the State as its Poet Laureate.

section.section:
The Poet Laureate:
may not receive compensation; but
subject to paragraph (2) of this subsection, is entitled to reimbursement for any expenses incurred in the performance of duties as Poet Laureate.

Reimbursement under this subsection:
shall be paid from the General Emergency Fund of the Board of Public Works; and
may not exceed $1,000 in any 1 fiscal year.
